title: Tim Bontemps on All-Defense & MVP Races and Dallas' Jalen Brunson
description:
Zach and ESPN's Tim Bontemps discuss the MVP and All-Defense races, then Jalen Brunson of the Dallas Mavericks joins to talk play-in, ribbing Luka Doncic, Steve Nash and Allen Iverson as inspirations, much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
